name: Bilans
description:
Bilans is an old-school style point-and-click developed in 2011 to tell about my freshman year in an art school.

In this game, you are supposed to play an art student (in fact, me.) rushing to make three art pieces for his exams.

Even though I drew all the backgrounds and the characters, I've never been able to find the time to develop it past the first act, so all I got is this demo.
